name: Deep Wave
description:
CoVixen Hair originates in the low country city in South Carolina. Our goal is to provide the best products for our well deserved divas. We want the best for ourselves so why shouldn`t our customers receive the same? So it`s our promise at CoVixen to NEVER sell you short & provide you with what you actually the deserve. The Best.


Each product are distributed from popular regions in Brazil. Hand measures & wefted to match your personal need. Each bundle weighs 4oz.

Soft high quality hair. Shed & Tangle free!

Our products come in Natural Hair Color &/or Black.  

"Natural Hair Color" = Not chemically altered or processed in any form.

All hair are measured at its straightened straight.

All hair are 100% high grade human hair. It can be dyed, colors & styled/shampooed.
